abstract:
UNITED STATES SENATE
WASHINGTON, o. C. 20510
CONNIE MACK
FLORID'"
June 16, 1995
Dear Mr. Malamud,
Thank you for making the Joint Economic Committee's
hearing on the 21st Century Economy a success.
This hearing was a modest example of how technologies
of the information revolution are changing American
government. I can foresee future hearings in which ill
witnesses have the opportunity to testify from their
homes or offices, and all Americans will be able to
participate via the Internet.
We coul
